1.1.3.name: wordpress/local-analytics
1.1.3.description:
Local Analytics is a Wordpress plugin for integrating Google Analytics, the free web analysis service by Google, into your blog. The plugin is highly configurable and also allows caching of the ga.js file locally, inorder to enable faster loading of pages.

The plugin is highly configurable, yet simple. A normal user only needs to specify his / her Analytics UID, while advanced users can completely configure the plugin.

Support * FAQ * Help * Version History

Features

  • Highly configurable
  • Compatible with latest Google Analytics Code Update
  • Includes support for local caching of ga.js
  • Includes support for tracking Adsense and YPN ad clicks
  • Includes support
